newsitem.title: MAURITIUS: Mauritius rupee weakens vs dollar, firms on pound.
newsitem.headline: Mauritius rupee weakens vs dollar, firms on pound.

text.p: The Mauritian rupee weakened slightly against the dollar but firmed on the pound on Friday, reflecting international market trends, foreign exchange dealers said.
The rupee was fixed at a commercial mean rate of 21.2545 to the dollar from 21.2355 on Thursday, and at 35.5235 to the pound from 35.6425.
Forex dealers said the dollar was steady in overnight international markets. They said the rupee's fixing against the pound was in line with its fall against the dollar in international markets.
